address.description: Address of user that sent the tx.

signature.description: The event signature, null if it’s an anonymous event.

returnValues.description: The return values from the event.

logIndex.description: Integer of the event index position in the block.

transactionIndex.description: Integer of the transaction’s index position the event was created in.

transactionHash.description: Hash of the transaction this event was created in.

blockHash.description: Hash of the block this event was created in. null when it’s still pending.

blockNumber.description: The block number this log was created in. null when still pending.
